author: Rachel Thompson
title: In March, half of visitors to the National Sexual Assault hotline came from minors
description: In March, half of visitors to the National Sexual Assault Hotline were minors. This grim statistic is a historic one. It's the first time in the hotline's history that minors have accounted for half of the people asking for help, according to a statement from…
content:
In March, half of visitors to the National Sexual Assault Hotline were minors. 
This grim statistic is a historic one. It's the first time in the hotline's history that minors have accounted for half of the people asking for help, according to a statement fr… [+2944 chars]
